items.raw_string: 30 June 2017, received £10,034.22 (salary and bonus payment), plus a car allowance of £400 and healthcare allowance of £9.27, for my  work as a lawyer at British Telecommunications plc, during the course of the election campaign and, in addition, for one week after the Election. Address: 81 Newgate Street, London EC1A 7AJ. Hours: 7 hrs since my election. (Registered 05 July 2017; updated 18 July 2017)
